page.title: 14Clubs and Societies
page.content: catering for a wide range of ages and interests. Several of these societies meet in the Community Centre which has been incorporated in the local{primary {school,Ysgol y Castell.}Clubs exist for specific age groups, ranging from the Youth Club to the Retired Residents Club.Groups with specific interests meet frequently at various times during the day. These interests are wide ranging and include the Red Cross, Ladies Sewing Group etc. {Sporting interests}are also catered for. The local{football club,}playing in black and gold stripes have a number of teams for ages ranging from adults to under 11's. These teams play in the local 'Clwyd League' and 'Rhyl and District Junior Leagues'. The local{Lawn Bowling Club}is flourishing and organises an impressive and well supported annual tournament.
